Element.Name: TestExce
Element.Descr: An excative package that manage the whole project and make calls to other neccessary pacakges as required

Element.Name: XML_IO
Element.Descr: An IO package invloved in input and output to and from disk
Element.Payload: I thought this is the better design to leave all the XML operations and inuput and output operation to this package; reather than doing all these operation DBEngine

Element.Name: DBElement
Element.Descr: DBElement the sturcture of each element for the noSQLdb
Element.Payload: As you see here DBElement structure defines the datastructure of each element as seen here Metadata and payload.

Element.Name: DBEngine
Element.Descr: DBEngine is the core of noSQL db
Element.Payload: It has Dictionary that enteres each DBElement in it as KEY/VALUE.Methods to manipulate data.

Element.Name: QueryEngine
Element.Descr: QueryEngine is the core of handeling and processing quries
Element.Payload: It process all the quries using Delegate and Predicate

Element.Name: Display
Element.Descr: define methods to simplify display actions
Element.Payload: This package implements formatting functions and tests them along with DBExtensions

Element.Name: DBExtenstion
Element.Payload: This package implements extensions methods to support displaying DBElements and DBEngine instances.
